de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card

Interface ICard

  • All Superinterfaces:
    de.intarsys.tools.attribute.IAttributeSupport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonCard, StandardCard

    public interface ICard
extends de.intarsys.tools.attribute.IAttributeSupport
    The abstraction of a smartcard inserted in an ICardTerminal. An ICard can be achieved by calling ICardTerminal.getCard() if present. Ensure thread safe implementation for IAttributeSupport!

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ICardConnection connectExclusive(int protocol)
      Connect to the card exclusive.

      Connect to the card asynchronously.
      ATR getAtr()
      The ATR identifying the ICard.
      ICardTerminal getCardTerminal()
      The ICardTerminal where the ICard is inserted.
      EnumCardState getState()
      The current state of the ICard.
      boolean isContactless()
      true if this card is "attached" via contactless reader.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.intarsys.tools.attribute.IAttributeSupport
